qas.question: What was the name of the organization that supported adding an additional hour to their clocks all year?

answers.text: the Royal Society for the Prevention of Accidents

qas.question: Joining farmers, what other kind of workers opposed SDST?
What regions of the United Kingdom were generally against SDST?

context: In the UK <a0_0>the Royal Society for the Prevention of Accidents<a0_0/> supports a proposal to observe SDST's additional hour year-round, but is opposed in some industries, such as <a1_0>postal workers<a1_0/> and farmers, and particularly by those living in the <a2_0>northern regions<a2_0/> of the UK.
